attributes.action:
Follow Australian rules on immigration if no papers
Deport / no right to stay
attributes.additional_details: This would stem the pull/ draw for illegal immigrants as they would never be allowed to claim asylum in this country on the Australian model it worked for them and will save billions of pounds to put in the economy/ save needless deaths at sea, save paying France who don't seem to care there ending
attributes.background: Stop all hand outs, not allow asylum to any migrant coming on boat without papers only allow the ones using correct routes, no asylum granted ever if arriving illegally never any rights to hospital dentist and right to stay

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Deport all illegal migrants in the United Kingdom
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/729231
